formatted_address: 18 Sin Ming Ln, #07-13A Strictly Via Appointment Only, Midview City, Singapore 573960
name: Collectors Ark

reviews.text: Randy is my go to trusted distributor for all my bust. His always been upfront about his prices and always delivers. I’ve spent over 30k on Queens and infinity studios busts from him and his always treated me fairly and kindly. He got you covered for any broken stuff if that ever happens. Customer service is great and that’s important. If you’re a VIP customer, then his services matches your status.
Collectorsark Deserve more then 5 stars honestly!  Excellent and top notch services and really friendly people . I will continue to buy from them in the future for sure !

vicinity: 18 Sin Ming Lane, #07-13A Strictly Via Appointment Only, Midview City, Singapore
